column1: Appendix table 4. Adults on probation, by gender, 2007
Author: Lauren E. Glaze and Thomas P. Bonczar
Appendix table 4. Adults on probation, by gender, 2007

a/Includes an estimated 26,000 probationers under the supervision of Oklahoma's state agency on December 31, 2007, and 2,150 probationers under the supervision of two localities in Oklahoma on December 31, 2007. Of those 2,150 probationers, 807 are male , 538 are female, and gender was not reported for the remaining 805 probationers.
b/Some or all detailed data are estimated for gender.

c/The state agency did not provide data. An estimated 26,000 probationers were under the supervision of Oklahoma's state agencey on December 31, 2007. Two localities in Oklahoma reported 2,150 probationers under their supervision on December 31, 2007 and an estimated 807 are male and 538 are female, and gender was not reported for the remaining 805 probationers.
